attributes.action: Rejoin the Single Market and Customs Union.
attributes.additional_details: The U.K. will benefit enormously both in terms of trade and security by a closer and more mature relationship with the EU without the need to rejoin the Union.
attributes.background: Given the state of our economy meaningful growth will not be achieved without re-establishing a stable trading relationship with Europe.

rejection.details:
We currently have the below petition open which you might like to sign:

Apply to join the Single Market and Customs Union at the earliest opportunity
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619362
